# Sprites are 8x8, 4 bits per pixel (complete overkill)
# 0-3 is the color for each pixel
#
# Runner - use color 2 (white)
# running right 0 of 3
00002000
00022200
00022200
02222000
22020220
00022000
22202200
00002200
# running right 2 of 3
00002000
00022200
00022200
00220220
00020000
02202000
00202000
# running right 3 of 3
00002000
00022200
00022200
00222020
02020220
00022000
00220220
02200000
#
